game.name: Frozen And Ariel Wedding
game.description:
Wow! Almost every girl enjoys the wedding season and it has really become a very special moment especially when you are going to marry with your love! Yes, the extremely gorgeous Anna is going to tie a knot with Kristoff. And, the lovely little mermaid Ariel and the snow queen Elsa are going to play the role of her bridesmaids. Be careful friends since Frozen, Anna is very choosy in the dress selection! Join Frozen And Ariel Wedding game and get ready to help the bride and bridesmaids to pick their costumes!
Their wardrobe is full of trendy and fashionable clothes, but both look pretty confused what to choose for this special occasion. Being a fashionista, your style sense and fashion ideas are popular across the city, so they have hired you as their personal stylist. Go through their wider outfit collection to help both the princesses to wear the crown of being the most charming and stunning girls of the party in this brand new dressing game! Pick up any bridesmaid first and help her choose her desirable costume!
Give her a nice one-piece outfit and pair it with a matching pair of sandals along with a suitable hairstyle and handbag in this html5 girls game! Do not forget to glow her face with the available beauty products. Practice your fashion abilities with the second bridesmaid as well! Hurry up, ladies! The bride is also waiting for her turn. Give her an elegant white color gown and pair with a suitable hairstyle, makeup and matching jewelry pieces! Make sure to choose a nice bouquet to give her a perfect wedding look. Check out more popular titles from the category of princess wedding games for girls that you can enjoy free online on atmegame.com, no download required!
